#summary Various *nix shell commands that I've used

Create a multiline file

{{{
$ cat > fox.dog
The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.
^D
}}}

Remove the .svn directories

{{{
find . -name '.svn' -exec rm -Rf '{}' \;
}}}
